Package singlePlayer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrickGenerator
    Class used in first and second level to create bricks.
    DelayTimer
    Class implementing a timer used by NormalLevel class to change game speed for a fixed amount of time.
    Meteor
    Class implementing a mateor that the player has to evade in second and third level.
    Mustache
    Class implements mustache that serves as a bonus feature, which when caught by the player increases his score gain and chance of getting a super power.
    PaddleTimer
    Class implementing timer used for super powers related to the paddle(it's size) and paddle's direction.
    SaveScores
    Class responsible for saving player's score after they finish one of the single player levels.
    SuperPower
    Class implements super powers that can spawn from broken bricks.
    Target
    Class implements target used in third level of single player mode.
